name: oTree
tagline: A software platform for economics experiments
body:
![oTree on 3 devices](http://i.imgur.com/On2aBmi.png)

* [Introduction to oTree (PowerPoint)](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=F9813DEE7F07C54C%2112217)
* [Live demo](http://demo.otree.org/)
* [Download & source code](https://github.com/oTree-org/oTree)
* [Technical documentation](https://github.com/oTree-org/otree/wiki)
* Working paper by [D. Chen](http://www.dlchen.ethz.ch/), [M. Schonger](http://www.n.ethz.ch/~scmartin/), and C. Wickens: [oTree: An Open-Source Platform for Laboratory, Online, and Field Experiments](http://www.otree.org/oTree.pdf)

oTree was created by the [Chen Group] at the Center for Law and Economics at ETH.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
